description: This file defines the UserEntity class, which is an entity model representing users in the database. It uses JPA annotations for ORM mapping and Lombok annotations for boilerplate code reduction.
external_methods: AuditAware (class or interface, likely contains auditing methods)

classes.name: UserEntity
classes.description: A JPA entity class representing the user table, extending AuditAware for auditing features.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Getter for the user's unique identifier.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Setter for the user's unique identifier.

methods.name: getIdentification
methods.description: Getter for the identification number or code.

methods.name: setIdentification
methods.description: Setter for the identification number or code.
